docs.snippet: Instagram plans to begin testing a move away from reverse chronological order in its news feeds. But will ardent users approve?

docs.snippet: Mark Zuckerberg has told investors over and over: Don’t expect Facebook to focus much on quarterly earnings. The company is taking the long view. But that long view is sure looking spectacular in quarterly earnings.
